This message was automatically generated.
Thanks for the patch!  I noticed that TestNameNodeMetrics#testCapacityMetrics also has a pretty low timeout (1.8 seconds, seems like an odd number).  I think we should bump that as well.
Thanks for committing it [~jlowe]. I wrongly assumed Eric had commit privileges.

bq. Thanks for committing it

I'm guessing this comment was meant for HADOOP-14377.  I haven't committed this one yet -- still waiting for Eric's response about the testCapacityMetrics comment.

Thanks for the review, [~jlowe]
bq. I noticed that TestNameNodeMetrics#testCapacityMetrics also has a pretty low timeout (1.8 seconds, seems like an odd number). I think we should bump that as well.
Uploading new patch that increases this to 10 seconds as well
